 So what kind of timeframe does this put the release of 1.0 in? Because I'm about to freak my noggin!

This is awesome!

> 
> Eeeep!
>  So what kind of timeframe does this put the release of 1.0 in? Because I'm about to freak my noggin!

Wow, my prediction of merch was way off! Hope the update drops sooner rather than later! 2 weeks maybe?

I was hoping it would be at least another month before Experimentals, because this update is being made a little too fast in my opinion. Hopefully we'll see lots of major bugs being squashed and features being polished in Experimentals though.

> 
> Now the Experimental Team can give us pic of fairings... right? ![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif)

No, expiramentals is not a release of the confidentiality agreements. We call that media release. (which usually occurs days before release)

> 
> Eeeep!
>  So what kind of timeframe does this put the release of 1.0 in? Because I'm about to freak my noggin!

Traditionally, 2 weeks, but it will likely be much longer for such a big patch. My best guess, end of April.
